A

addArg(String) - Method in class edu.jsu.mcis.ArgumentParser
This method adds the argument provided to the list by calling the main constructor by providing a blank string for a description and defaulting the argument to type string.
addArg(String, String) - Method in class edu.jsu.mcis.ArgumentParser
This method adds the argument provided to the list by calling main constructor by providing the name and description, provided by the user, and defaulting the type to string.
addArg(String, String, Argument.Type) - Method in class edu.jsu.mcis.ArgumentParser
This method adds the argument provided to the list by calling main constructor by providing the name, description, and type of argument, as provided by the user.
addNamedArg(String, String, String, Argument.Type, String) - Method in class edu.jsu.mcis.ArgumentParser
This method adds a named argument by adding it to the args list and to the NamedArgs class.
addPosArg(String, String, Argument.Type, String) - Method in class edu.jsu.mcis.ArgumentParser
This method adds a positional argument by adding it to the args list and to the PosArgs class.

Argument() - Constructor for class edu.jsu.mcis.Argument
This is the default constructor.
Argument(String) - Constructor for class edu.jsu.mcis.Argument
In this constructor the user specifies the name of the argument but no description.
Argument(String, String) - Constructor for class edu.jsu.mcis.Argument
In this constructor the user specifies the name and description of the argument.
Argument(String, String, Argument.Type) - Constructor for class edu.jsu.mcis.Argument
In this constructor the user specifies the name, description, and type of argument.
Argument.Type - Enum in edu.jsu.mcis
The enumeration Type is used to set the type of argument.

C

checkArgsThenParse(String[]) - Method in class edu.jsu.mcis.ArgumentParser
This method checks for the named arguments, assigns their default values, and removes the arguments from the array of arguments.

S

save(ArgumentParser, String) - Static method in class edu.jsu.mcis.XMLTools
This method is used to save arguments and their values to a specified XML file.

This method sets the description of an argument.
setValue(String) - Method in class edu.jsu.mcis.Argument
This method is called in the parse methods when the user provides a value for an argument.
stringToXML() - Method in class edu.jsu.mcis.Argument
This method returns part of the contents of an XML file to be written.
stringToXML() - Method in class edu.jsu.mcis.NamedArg
This method is used by the writeArgsAsXML method in ArgumentParser, which is used by the save method in XMLTools, to write the named arguments to an XML file.
stringToXML() - Method in class edu.jsu.mcis.PosArg
This method is used by the writeArgsAsXML method in ArgumentParser, which is called by the save method in XMLTools, to write the positional arguments to an XML file.
